title: Episode 46: They Were Bigger People Somehow

media:group.media:title: Episode 46: They Were Bigger People Somehow
media:group.media:description:
80 years after Pearl Harbor, nostalgia for the World War II generation as is great as ever...and for good reason.

Google Books link to Life Magazine issue with page featuring "What the U.S.A. Thinks" Survey, Jul 29 1940 https://books.google.com/books?id=xz8EAAAAMBAJ&pg=PA20&source=gbs_toc_r&cad=2#v=onepage&q&f=false

"The American Century" by Henry Luce http://www-personal.umich.edu/~mlassite/discussions261/luce.pdf
